fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a player at night. They will die, no matter what.
- Attempt to reach out to someone during the day. (2 Uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, a random faction (with a factional kill) will be selected. All kills done by you will appear to have been from that faction. It may or may not be an actual faction in the game, it just needs to have a factional kill.
- Roleblock, control, redirect, and prevention immune.
- You must kill someone every night.
- If you reach out to a member of the Unseen, you will join their factional chat. Otherwise, nothing happens.
- If you run out of uses for your second ability, your win condition will change to “Kill all who would oppose you.”
